{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3135710,"name":"Ryan","username":"rlindsay","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/d2c977/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-01-29T01:12:50.173Z","cooked":"

REV MAXSwerve has been awesome. We switched to the pigeon 2.0 and 1 issue we ran into was running field relative. Forward changed as you rotated the robot.

Solution so far:
Rotation2d.fromDegrees(m_gyro.getAngle()),

  • changed it to
    m_gyro.getRotation2d(),

Kids and an adult more capable than me got it working, but wanted to share in case anyone else having issues.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2023-01-29T01:12:50.173Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":216,"reads":151,"readers_count":150,"score":1140.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":425003,"topic_slug":"pigeon-rev-max-swerve-issue-and-solution-we-think","display_username":"Ryan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":34196,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/pigeon-rev-max-swerve-issue-and-solution-we-think/425003/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3135718,"name":"asa","username":"AngleSideAngle","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/anglesideangle/{size}/179617_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-29T01:26:18.498Z","cooked":"

The source code of getRotation2d is as follows:

public Rotation2d getRotation2d() {
    //Rotation2d and Pigeon are both ccw+
    return Rotation2d.fromDegrees(getFusedHeading());
 }

So it makes sense that this would have fewer issues with error, since (I think) fused heading is calculated with the compass in addition to gyro.

I think your library is outdated, mine uses getYaw for that function.
